monero.wallet

Interface MoneroWallet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoneroWalletDefault, MoneroWalletRpc

    public interface MoneroWallet
    Monero wallet interface.

      • checkTxKey

        MoneroCheckTx checkTxKey(java.lang.String txId,
                         java.lang.String txKey,
                         java.lang.String address)
        Check a transaction in the blockchain with its secret key.
        Parameters:
        txId - specifies the transaction to check
        txKey - is the transaction's secret key
        address - is the destination public address of the transaction
        Returns:
        MoneroCheckTx is the result of the check

      • getTxProof

        java.lang.String getTxProof(java.lang.String txId,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String message)
        Get a transaction signature to prove it.
        Parameters:
        txId - specifies the transaction to prove
        address - is the destination public address of the transaction
        message - is a message to include with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        Returns:
        String is the transaction signature

      • checkTxProof

        MoneroCheckTx checkTxProof(java.lang.String txId,
                           java.lang.String address,
                           java.lang.String message,
                           java.lang.String signature)
        Prove a transaction by checking its signature.
        Parameters:
        txId - specifies the transaction to prove
        address - is the destination public address of the transaction
        message - is a message included with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        signature - is the transaction signature to confirm
        Returns:
        MoneroCheckTx is the result of the check

      • getSpendProof

        java.lang.String getSpendProof(java.lang.String txId,
                               java.lang.String message)
        Generate a signature to prove a spend. Unlike proving a transaction, it does not require the destination public address.
        Parameters:
        txId - specifies the transaction to prove
        message - is a message to include with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        Returns:
        String is the transaction signature

      • checkSpendProof

        boolean checkSpendProof(java.lang.String txId,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String signature)
        Prove a spend using a signature. Unlike proving a transaction, it does not require the destination public address.
        Parameters:
        txId - specifies the transaction to prove
        message - is a message included with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        signature - is the transaction signature to confirm
        Returns:
        true if the signature is good, false otherwise

      • getReserveProof

        java.lang.String getReserveProof(java.lang.String message)
        Generate a signature to prove the entire balance of the wallet.
        Parameters:
        message - is a message included with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        Returns:
        String is the reserve proof signature

      • getReserveProof

        java.lang.String getReserveProof(int accountIdx,
                                 java.math.BigInteger amount,
                                 java.lang.String message)
        Generate a signature to prove an available amount in an account.
        Parameters:
        accountIdx - specifies the account to prove contains an available amount
        amount - is the minimum amount to prove as available in the account
        message - is a message to include with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        Returns:
        String is the reserve proof signature

      • checkReserveProof

        MoneroCheckReserve checkReserveProof(java.lang.String address,
                                     java.lang.String message,
                                     java.lang.String signature)
        Proves a wallet has a disposable reserve using a signature.
        Parameters:
        address - is the public wallet address
        message - is a message included with the signature to further authenticate the proof (optional)
        signature - is the reserve proof signature to check
        Returns:
        MoneroCheckReserve is the result of checking the signature proof

      • getKeyImages

        java.util.Collection<MoneroKeyImage> getKeyImages()
        Returns a signed set of key images.
        Returns:
        Collection are exported key images

      • importKeyImages

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigInteger> importKeyImages(java.util.Collection<MoneroKeyImage> keyImages)
        Import signed key images list and verify their spent status.
        Parameters:
        keyImages - are key images to import
        Returns:
        Map contains "height", "spent", and "unspent"

      • getAddressBookEntries

        java.util.List<MoneroAddressBookEntry> getAddressBookEntries()
        Returns all address book entries.
        Returns:
        List are the wallet's address book entries

      • getAddressBookEntries

        java.util.List<MoneroAddressBookEntry> getAddressBookEntries(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> entryIndices)
        Returns address book entries at the given indices.
        Parameters:
        entryIndices - are entry indices to retrieve
        Returns:
        List are the wallet's address book entries

      • addAddressBookEntry

        int addAddressBookEntry(java.lang.String address,
                        java.lang.String description)
        Adds an address book entry.
        Parameters:
        address - is the entry's Monero address
        description - is the entry's description (optional)
        Returns:
        int is the index of the new address book entry

      • verify

        boolean verify(java.lang.String data,
               java.lang.String address,
               java.lang.String signature)
        Verify a signature on a string.
        Parameters:
        data - is the signed string
        address - is the signing address
        signature - is the signature
        Returns:
        true if the signature is good, false otherwise
